title: Metric Building of pp Wave Orbifold Geometries
abstract: We study strings on orbifolds of $AdS_{5}\times S^5$ by SU(2) discrete groups in the Penrose limit. We derive the degenerate metrics of pp wave of $AdS_{5}\times S^5/\Gamma$ using ordinary $ADE$ and affine $\wildtilde{ADE}$ singularities of complex surfaces and results on ${\cal N}=4$ CFT$_4$'s. We also give explicit metric moduli depencies for abelian and non abelian orbifolds.
